verses.text: \w Suddenly|strong="H2009"\w*, \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w standing|strong="H5975"\w* \w beside|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w burn|strong="H6999"\w* \w incense|strong="H6999"\w*, \w there|strong="H2009"\w* \w came|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* man \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Bethel|strong="H1008"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w cried|strong="H7121"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, “\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, \w this|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: ‘\w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w named|strong="H7121"\w* \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1697"\w* \w born|strong="H3205"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w high|strong="H1116"\w* \w places|strong="H1116"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w burn|strong="H8313"\w* \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* human \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1697"\w* \w burned|strong="H8313"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*.’”

\w That|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w man|strong="H2088"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w sign|strong="H4159"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1696"\w*, “\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w sign|strong="H4159"\w*: ‘\w Surely|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w split|strong="H7167"\w* \w apart|strong="H7167"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w ashes|strong="H1880"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w poured|strong="H8210"\w* \w out|strong="H8210"\w*.’”

\w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w*, \w who|strong="H4428"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Bethel|strong="H1008"\w*, \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* man \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w cried|strong="H7121"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H7121"\w*, \w he|strong="H3027"\w* \w stretched|strong="H7971"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w his|strong="H7121"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w*, “\w Seize|strong="H8610"\w* \w him|strong="H7121"\w*!” \w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w he|strong="H3027"\w* \w stretched|strong="H7971"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w toward|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H7121"\w* \w withered|strong="H3001"\w*, \w so|strong="H7971"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w he|strong="H3027"\w* \w could|strong="H3201"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w pull|strong="H3201"\w* \w it|strong="H7121"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w split|strong="H7167"\w* \w apart|strong="H7167"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w ashes|strong="H1880"\w* \w poured|strong="H8210"\w* \w out|strong="H8210"\w*, \w according|strong="H4480"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w sign|strong="H4159"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* man \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H6030"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w responded|strong="H6030"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w man|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, “\w Intercede|strong="H6419"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w pray|strong="H6419"\w* \w for|strong="H1157"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w restored|strong="H7725"\w*.” \w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w man|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w interceded|strong="H6419"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w restored|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w it|strong="H7725"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* man \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w*, “Come \w home|strong="H1004"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w refresh|strong="H5582"\w* \w yourself|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w reward|strong="H4991"\w*.”

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w man|strong="H2088"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w* replied, “If \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w were|strong="H4325"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* possessions, \w I|strong="H5414"\w* still \w would|strong="H4428"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H4428"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w would|strong="H4428"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w eat|strong="H3899"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H3651"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H1697"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*: ‘\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w eat|strong="H3899"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w came|strong="H1980"\w*.’”

\w So|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* man \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w another|strong="H3808"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w by|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w had|strong="H1008"\w* \w come|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w Bethel|strong="H1008"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* certain \w old|strong="H1121"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w was|strong="H1697"\w* \w living|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w Bethel|strong="H1008"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w came|strong="H1697"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w told|strong="H1696"\w* \w him|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w deeds|strong="H4639"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H2205"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w God|strong="H1008"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w Bethel|strong="H1008"\w*. \w They|strong="H3117"\w* \w also|strong="H6213"\w* \w told|strong="H1696"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H2205"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

“\w Which|strong="H2088"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w did|strong="H3063"\w* \w he|strong="H1980"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w*?” \w their|strong="H7200"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w* \w asked|strong="H1696"\w*. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w showed|strong="H7200"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* taken \w by|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* God, \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w had|strong="H3063"\w* \w come|strong="H1980"\w* \w from|strong="H1980"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.

\w So|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* prophet said \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, “\w Saddle|strong="H2280"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w donkey|strong="H2543"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.” \w Then|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w saddled|strong="H2280"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w donkey|strong="H2543"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w mounted|strong="H7392"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*

\w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* after \w the|strong="H8478"\w* man \w of|strong="H3427"\w* God. \w He|strong="H3063"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w him|strong="H4672"\w* \w sitting|strong="H3427"\w* \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w an|strong="H4672"\w* oak tree \w and|strong="H3063"\w* asked, “\w Are|strong="H8478"\w* \w you|strong="H4672"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* man \w of|strong="H3427"\w* God \w who|strong="H3427"\w* \w came|strong="H3212"\w* \w from|strong="H8478"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*?” “\w I|strong="H4672"\w* am,” \w he|strong="H3063"\w* replied.

So \w the|strong="H1004"\w* prophet said \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H1004"\w* man \w of|strong="H1004"\w* God, “\w Come|strong="H3212"\w* \w home|strong="H1004"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w me|strong="H3212"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w eat|strong="H3899"\w* some \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*.”

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w man|strong="H2088"\w* replied, “\w I|strong="H3201"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H7725"\w* \w home|strong="H4725"\w* \w with|strong="H3899"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w I|strong="H3201"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w eat|strong="H3899"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w with|strong="H3899"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w* \w in|strong="H3899"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w been|strong="H3808"\w* \w told|strong="H1697"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*: ‘\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w eat|strong="H3899"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w came|strong="H1980"\w*.’”

\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w replied|strong="H1696"\w*, “\w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w too|strong="H1571"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w like|strong="H3644"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w an|strong="H3068"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w me|strong="H7725"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1697"\w*, ‘\w Bring|strong="H7725"\w* \w him|strong="H7725"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w so|strong="H7725"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w eat|strong="H3899"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.’” \w The|strong="H3068"\w* old \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w lying|strong="H3584"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w him|strong="H7725"\w*,

\w but|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* man \w of|strong="H1004"\w* God \w went|strong="H7725"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w him|strong="H7725"\w*, ate \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w drank|strong="H8354"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.

\w While|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w sitting|strong="H3427"\w* \w at|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w table|strong="H7979"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w brought|strong="H7725"\w* \w him|strong="H7725"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w*,
